ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] ONElist
ygData.msgSnippet: After onelist it became egroups and now it s yahoogroups.  Go to www.yahoogroups.com and if you don t have a yahoo email address, then you have to sign up for
ygData.messageBody:
After onelist it became egroups and now it's yahoogroups.  Go to
www.yahoogroups.com and if you don't have a yahoo email address, then you
have to sign up for one before it will let you do anything.  This totally
urked me and I wrote a letter to yahoo complaining about having to get a
stupid yahoo email address when I didn't want one and would never use it.  
Anyway after you do that you can go to the everquest list and do whatever
needs done.


I signed up when this was with onelist and I dont have a damn clue how to
change receiving options or remove myself from the list.. any suggestions?
and when did this turn into Yahoo? i never paid much attention to the junk
at the bottom



Lena
mom to Jordan Trevor 6-1-93, Joshua Tyler (Josh) 12-6-94 & Joseph Trey (Joey)
10-19-99
and wife to Jason
